identified-content.person: ABRAMS, DR. JANINE CAROL (DR. JANINE CAROL RETHY)

block.p: Dr. Janine Carol Abrams, a daughter of Cathy Abrams and Dr. Denis Abrams of New York, is to be married this evening to Dr. Michael Charles Rethy, the son of Vicki Rethy and Dr. Charles Rethy of Cheshire, Conn. Rabbi Jonathan Klein is to officiate at Tavern on the Green in Manhattan.

The bride, 26, and the bridegroom, 25, graduated from Cornell University and received M.D. degrees from the Mount Sinai School of Medicine on May 12. On July 1, they will start internships in New York, she at Mount Sinai Medical Center and he at Lenox Hill Hospital.

Dr. Janine Carol Abrams, a daughter of Cathy Abrams and Dr. Denis Abrams of New York, is to be married this evening to Dr. Michael Charles Rethy, the son of Vicki Rethy and Dr. Charles Rethy of Cheshire, Conn. Rabbi Jonathan Klein is to officiate at Tavern on the Green in Manhattan.

The bride, 26, and the bridegroom, 25, graduated from Cornell University and received M.D. degrees from the Mount Sinai School of Medicine on May 12. On July 1, they will start internships in New York, she at Mount Sinai Medical Center and he at Lenox Hill Hospital.

The bride's father is the vice president for operations of Benjamin Moore, the paint manufacturer in Montvale, N.J. The bridegroom's father, an internist, is a partner in Hamden Internal Medicine Associates in Hamden, Conn. The bridegroom's mother is a laboratory technologist there.
The couple met in 1995, while studying abroad for their junior years. It was April in Paris.
